name: Mageki's Quest
description:
Mageki is a friendly witch traveling arround a forest cursed by a big bunch of ghosts.

But, what is she searching for...?

Controls
  • Arrows: Move
  • Z: Shoot (hold for a while to charge stamina for a more powerful attack)
  • F11: Fullscreen
Credits
  • Game by Oscar Moreno (Asdonaur)
  • Original Soundtrack by RezDro
  • Font: Nokia Cellphone BC, by Zeh Fernando
  • All audio assets used:
    • Impact Sounds, UI Audio, Digital Audio and Sci-fi Sounds, by Kenney
    • Nokia Jam Resources
    • Other sounds:
      • https://freesound.org/people/BlueDelta/sounds/446753/
      • https://freesound.org/people/inuetc/sounds/507902/
      • https://freesound.org/people/Eelke/sounds/185368/
